des: "Classic tomato and basil bruschetta get a zesty update with old style mustard."
ins: Toast the bread in the oven. Rub the bread with the garlic and top with a drizzle of olive oil. In a bowl, stir tomatoes, onion and Maille(R) Old Style mustard. Spread preparation on the slices of toasted bread. Add olive oil, salt and pepper, and garnish with chopped basil.
